  <script>
document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
  const sidebar = document.getElementById('sidebar');
  const toggleBtn = document.getElementById('toggleSidebar');
  const navIcons = document.querySelectorAll('.nav-icon');
  const pages = document.querySelectorAll('.page');
  const searchInput = document.getElementById('searchInput');
  const searchResults = document.getElementById('searchResults');
  const searchIconCollapsed = document.getElementById('searchIconCollapsed');

  // ========== TOGGLE SIDEBAR ==========
  if (toggleBtn) {
    toggleBtn.addEventListener('click', function() {
      sidebar.classList.toggle('sidebar-collapsed');
    });
  }

  // ========== TOGGLE SIDEBAR from collapsed search ==========
  searchIconCollapsed.addEventListener('click', function() {
    if (sidebar.classList.contains('sidebar-collapsed')) {
      sidebar.classList.remove('sidebar-collapsed');
    }
    searchInput.focus();
  });

  // ========== SEARCH ==========
  const menuData = [
    { day: 'Senin', items: 'Nasi Liwet, Ayam Goreng, Tahu Tempe Bacem, Sayur Asem, Sambal, Buah' },
    { day: 'Selasa', items: 'Nasi Putih, Ikan Bakar, Tumis Kangkung, Perkedel Kentang, Sambal, Buah' },
    { day: 'Rabu', items: 'Nasi Uduk, Rendang Daging, Telur Balado, Lalapan, Sambal, Buah' },
    { day: 'Kamis', items: 'Nasi Kuning, Ayam Pop, Capcay, Sambal Ijo, Buah' },
    { day: 'Jumat', items: 'Nasi Putih, Cumi Asam Manis, Oseng Buncis, Tahu, Sambal, Buah' },
    { day: 'Sabtu', items: 'Nasi Goreng Seafood, Bakwan Jagung, Acar, Buah' }
  ];

  function searchMenu(query) {
    searchResults.innerHTML = '';

    if (!query.trim()) {
      searchResults.classList.remove('visible');
      return;
    }

    const results = menuData.filter(item =>
      item.day.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase()) ||
      item.items.toLowerCase().includes(query.toLowerCase())
    );

    if (results.length === 0) {
      searchResults.innerHTML = `<div class="search-result-item text-center py-4"><p>Menu tidak ditemukan</p></div>`;
      searchResults.classList.add('visible');
      return;
    }

    results.forEach(result => {
      const highlightedItems = highlightMatches(result.items, query);
      const highlightedDay = highlightMatches(result.day, query);
      const resultItem = document.createElement('div');
      resultItem.className = 'search-result-item';
      resultItem.innerHTML = `<div class="font-bold text-primary">${highlightedDay}</div><div class="text-sm mt-1">${highlightedItems}</div>`;

      resultItem.addEventListener('click', function() {
        const dayElement = document.querySelector(`[data-menu*="${result.day.toLowerCase()}"]`);
        if (dayElement) {
          dayElement.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'center' });
          dayElement.style.transition = 'all 0.3s';
          dayElement.style.boxShadow = '0 0 0 3px rgba(16, 185, 129, 0.5)';
          setTimeout(() => dayElement.style.boxShadow = '', 2000);
        }

        searchInput.value = '';
        searchResults.classList.remove('visible');
      });

      searchResults.appendChild(resultItem);
    });

    searchResults.classList.add('visible');
  }

  function highlightMatches(text, query) {
    if (!query) return text;
    const regex = new RegExp(query, 'gi');
    return text.replace(regex, match => `<span class="highlight">${match}</span>`);
  }

  searchInput.addEventListener('input', function() {
    searchMenu(this.value);
  });

  searchInput.addEventListener('focus', function() {
    if (this.value.trim()) {
      searchResults.classList.add('visible');
    }
  });

  document.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
    if (!e.target.closest('.search-container') && !e.target.closest('#searchResults')) {
      searchResults.classList.remove('visible');
    }
  });

  // ========== BOTTOM NAVIGATION ==========
  navIcons.forEach(icon => {
    icon.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      const target = this.getAttribute('data-target');
      navIcons.forEach(i => i.classList.remove('active'));
      this.classList.add('active');
      pages.forEach(page => page.classList.remove('active'));
      document.getElementById(target).classList.add('active');
      window.scrollTo(0, 0);
    });
  });

  // ========== RESPONSIVE BACKGROUND ==========
  function adjustBackground() {
    const dashboardSection = document.getElementById('dashboard');
    if (dashboardSection && window.innerWidth < 768) {
      dashboardSection.style.backgroundSize = "auto 100%";
    }
  }

  adjustBackground();
  window.addEventListener('resize', adjustBackground);

  // ========== CLOSE SIDEBAR ON MOBILE ==========
  const menuLinks = document.querySelectorAll('.menu-link');
  menuLinks.forEach(link => {
    link.addEventListener('click', function() {
      if (window.innerWidth < 1000) {
        sidebar.classList.remove('sidebar-collapsed');
      }
    });
  });
});
  </script>
